channel.title: Quest tab commands
channel.description: I forgot on how to make it when you click a command in my questab, you cant get it without paying 500k.

item.title: Quest tab commands
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:10, topic:538603”][quote author=DAn0194 link=topic=657433.msg4398094#msg4398094 date=1389729869]

//This would be in clicking buttons case CASE_ID: if(c.getItems().playerHasItem(995, 500000)) //If the player has 500k. doStuff(); else System.out.println("Can't do this"); break;
cbf doing full conventions and yada yada.

Else should be

U make me so angry.

[/quote]
No, Dan, you’re mistaken.
I said I cbf to do the conventions because I typed all that in the reply box, it had nothing to do with anything else. I don’t like to properly write shit in the reply area because you can’t tab, so I half ass it. What I supplied still works, and that’s what I was going for, seeing as it was only an example[/quote]
I know bro

Read full topic

item.title: Quest tab commands
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“DAn0194, post:5, topic:538603”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=657433.msg4398058#msg4398058 date=1389718106]

//This would be in clicking buttons case CASE_ID: if(c.getItems().playerHasItem(995, 500000)) //If the player has 500k. doStuff(); else System.out.println("Can't do this"); break;
cbf doing full conventions and yada yada.
[/quote]
Else should be

U make me so angry.[/quote]
No, Dan, you’re mistaken.
I said I cbf to do the conventions because I typed all that in the reply box, it had nothing to do with anything else. I don’t like to properly write shit in the reply area because you can’t tab, so I half ass it. What I supplied still works, and that’s what I was going for, seeing as it was only an example

Read full topic

item.title: Quest tab commands
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

[quote=“DAn0194, post:7, topic:538603”][quote author=n10si t link=topic=657433.msg4398114#msg4398114 date=1389735290]
Dan, please know what you’re talking about before trying to call someone out on it: http://docs.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/java/nutsandbolts/if.html
[/quote]
I made that post as a joke because he said he doesn’t care about conventions.

btw what I said was right when you use an if statement and an else you do it like this

if (condition) { statements; } else { statements; }

http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/documentation/codeconventions-142311.html#449[/quote]

Ah. I thought you were saying the way he had done it wouldn’t work, I didn’t realize you were fixing his conventions. My bad.

Read full topic
